title: N300 Mayo Cut Plug Ganzel (Boston) for Sale - SOLD!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: N300 Mayo Cut Plug Ganzel (Boston) for Sale - SOLD!!
posts.post_content:
McCarthy is in great shape but is missing the bottom tab and is unfortunately missing the black layer on back.  Ganzel is in similar shape but does have a crease across the middle.  Asking $350 for McCarthy and $95 for Ganzel which is still cheap for Mayos!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=585925&d=1692901129[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=585926&d=1692901140[/IMG]

McCarthy is still available and I just added a Ganzel for sale as well.  Both cards are trimmed & skinned unfortunately, but at least they're cheap!

Happy to trade both cards for a Mayo common I'm still needing for my set....

Thanks!

Brian

Bump!  Lowering prices to $325 for McCarthy and $85 for Ganzel.

Or take BOTH cards for $375!!

Thanks!

Ganzel still available at $60.  I know there's a few people working on Mayo's these days....this is an affordable one!!
